## QualifierTypes.LiteralValueHierarchy.getRoots() method

Gets all root values (values with no parent) in the hierarchy.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getRoots(): Result<T[]>;
```
**Returns:**

Result&lt;T\[\]&gt;

`Success` with an array of root values.
